definition: to develop/to evolve/to practice/to perform/to play/to act
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: The fault tree of electric submersible pump system is established by deductive method.
sentences.chinese: 用演繹法建立了潛油電泵系統的故障樹。

sentences.english: The result calculated by the deductive method is wrong.
sentences.chinese: 用演繹法推算的結果是錯誤的。

sentences.english: A definition paper may be either deductive or inductive.
sentences.chinese: 定義說明文可用演繹法或歸納法展開。
